Reviews.Title: as described
Reviews.Author: Gerry
Reviews.Content: this is a well constructed cable, much better than the one comes with the security cams pack. I'll recommend it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Plug and Play ready; For camera with DC power only
All-in-one video and power cable
150 feet video/power cables in black
Output type BNC video connector & 2.1mm power connectors
Video/Power cable has BNC connectors and includes 2 BNC/RCA adapters
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 150ft Video Power Extension Cable Wire for CCTV DVR CCD Security Cameras Surveillance System with BNC to RCA Adaptor 1LY
